sentences.en: Be particularly fastidious about washing your hands before touching food.
sentences.cn: 接触食物前尤其对洗手不能有半点马虎。

sentences.en: Flavored coffee is sold at gourmet food stores and coffee shops.
sentences.cn: 花式咖啡可在美食店和咖啡店买到。

sentences.en: Food production has already fallen behind the population growth.
sentences.cn: 粮食生产已经跟不上人口增长。

sentences.en: He was told to cut down on salty and fatty foods.
sentences.cn: 他被告知要少吃过咸和油腻的食物。

sentences.en: I had to stock the boat up with food.
I have always had an enquiring mind where food is concerned.
sentences.cn: 我在吃的方面一向很爱探究求索。

sentences.en: I love Italian food, especially pasta.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢意大利食物，尤其是面食。

sentences.en: Many farms are jumping on the bandwagon and advertising organically grown food.
sentences.cn: 很多农场正赶潮流宣传有机食品。

sentences.en: Megamalls and fast food restaurants line the highway system.
sentences.cn: 公路系统沿线有大型商场和快餐店。

sentences.en: Organic food is unadulterated food produced without artificial chemicals or pesticides.
sentences.cn: 有机食品是未使用人工化学制剂和杀虫剂的纯净食品。

sentences.en: President Garcia has ordered an airlift of food, medicines and blankets.
sentences.cn: 加西亚总统已经下令空运食品、药物和毛毯。

sentences.en: She could ring for food and drink, laundry and sundry services.
sentences.cn: 她可以打电话点餐，叫人来取要洗的衣服以及叫其他各种服务。

sentences.en: The first plane-loads of food, children's clothing and medical supplies began arriving.
sentences.cn: 首批飞机运送的食物、儿童衣物和药品开始抵达。

sentences.en: The following recipe is a statement of another kind—food is fun!
sentences.cn: 下面的食谱是另一种观点的表现——食物可以带来乐趣！

sentences.en: The restaurant serves good food at affordable prices.
The shallow sea bed yields up an abundance of food.
sentences.cn: 浅海床提供了丰富的食物。

sentences.en: Truckloads of food, blankets, and other necessities reached the city.
sentences.cn: 成车的食物、毯子与其他必需品抵达了该市。

sentences.en: Wash your hands thoroughly with hot soapy water before handling any food.
sentences.cn: 在拿吃的之前，用热肥皂水把手好好地洗干净。

phrases.tran_cn: 中餐；中国食物；中式食品
食品加工，食品处理；进食，食品热杀菌
食品生产；粮食生产；食品加工
粮食安全；食品安全；食物保障
垃圾食物；无营养的速食；华而不实的东西

trans.tran_cn: 食物，食品，粮食，养料，资料
trans.tran_en: things that people and animals eat, such as vege-tables or meat
things that people and animals eat, such as vege-tables or meat
